summary: A weekend retreat at a remote cabin in the woods for a group of childhood pals turns into a terrifying fight for survival, as a former friend whose family was killed years earlier comes along looking for revenge.
cast: Michael Mfume|Sandra Pulley|Joe Clair|Racquel Price|Tracy Wiggs|Maria Copper|Kelci Jeter|Greg Jones|Kristine Louisa|Fredrick Montgomery|Thomas Hunt|D-Taylor Murphy|Chris Gatewood|Archie Williams|Julia Gorin|Kevin Cameron|Joe Housley|Larry Westland Jr.|John Wardlow|Paige Washington|Larry Coates Jr.|Johann D. Will|Shawnté D. Will|Joseph C. Heffner|Arthur M. Jolly
keywords: slasher|slasher flick|teen horror|independent film|group of friends
title: The Weekend It Lives
